Description: Phenomenal 4 bed 4 bath recent gut renovation with laundry in unit and parking. Phenomenal, everyone gets a private bathroom! One month broker fee listing. Entirely gut renovated just the year before last with access to the express buses and walkable to the T as well in just a few blocks. Luxury finishes, granite island, beautiful renovated bathrooms and gleaming hardwood floors. This is a place that will make you proud to call home and make all your friends green with envy when they come to visit. One month broker fee applies.
